mapper.insert: INSERT into student (name, num, college_id, telphone, id_card_no, gender, account, password) VALUES (#{name}, #{num}, #{collegeId}, #{telphone}, #{idCardNo}, #{gender}, #{account}, #{password})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.num, c.name AS collegeName, s.telphone, s.id_card_no, CASE gender WHEN 0 THEN "男" ELSE "女" END AS genderName, s.account FROM student AS s JOIN college AS c ON s.college_id = c.id
mapper.delete: UPDATE student SET name = #{name}, num = #{num}, college_id = #{collegeId}, telphone = #{telphone}, id_card_no = #{idCardNo}, gender = #{gender}, account = #{account}, password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM student WHERE account = #{account} AND password = #{password}
